answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Shelly – I hope the following is helpful:
Yorkville, IL – agreement and policy
http://www.yorkville.il.us/documents/YouthBaseball.pdf 
Memphis, TN – Facility Rental Policy 
http://www.memphistn.gov/commonforms/forms/Rental%20Policy%20Final%20Version%20-%20Rev%20Jul%2009.pdf 
Gaithersburg, MD - POLICIES FOR USE OF ATHLETIC FIELDS including fees
http://www.gaithersburgmd.gov/Documents/sports/athletic_field_use_policy.pdf
Lake Worth, TX - Rental Fees and Information
http://www.lakeworthtx.org/opencms/opencms/resident_services/City_Rentals.html 
Marco Island, FL – Resolution re: facility use and fees
http://www.cityofmarcoisland.com/modules/showdocument.aspx?documentid=7935 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Shelly Todd
text: Our municipality will be opening soccer and football fields next year. I am looking for athletic field rental fee structures and policy examples.
title: Athletic Field Rentals
